data.text: @Matilda_so_Blue LOL nice!
@Stephng26 apologies for the inconvenience!
Hi @Stephng26 unfortunately you will have to book the flights separately and re-check your bag at Don Mueang Airport to Krabi.

Nok Air has partnered with TAT launch the "TAT-Nok Air Let's go South Thailand". More info at http://t.co/T9cOgygar2
http://t.co/9INCp6MSZ9
@Matilda_so_Blue We would love to have her wear that dress on our flight, anytime! :)
Hi @ArtieDivin1 apologies for the late reply. Glad you found our booking system easy to use, we hope you'll be using it more often :)
@DelSpaff Sorry for the late reply. Glad you enjoy enjoyed the waterproof pouch, and hope you had a great Songkran :)
HI @Stephng26 you can book flights to Krabi at http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl with a free 15kg of free checked luggage.
Nok Air joins locals in Yangon to celebrate the Myanmar Summer Festival http://t.co/i19EHhp5fs
Today is National Senior Citizen's Day and we are serving "kanom kleeb lamduan" to our senior passengers. http://t.co/evsZNXrB23
Today we'll join in on the fun at the Hat Yat Songkran Festival. Come and have fun with us! http://t.co/qF4o0sbEXV
For those who want to share smiles with others, out "Nok Gives Life" key chains will make the perfect gift. http://t.co/jBfkf9JatP
Don't miss your chance to book this special price with Nok Air's Early Bird&Night Owl. Check http://t.co/09SGgvjEDv http://t.co/BCMbtfSvyh
To celebrate Songkran, our Nok Ambassadors will be dressed in traditional Thai dress on selected flights. http://t.co/LRRTlROvXC
To celebrate Songkran, our Nok Air ambassadors will be dressed in traditional Thai dress on selected flights. http://t.co/LFUJPNMV6b
RT @airwaysmagazine: The 8,000th @Boeing #737 took flight yesterday, 47 years after the types 1st flight. A brief history, with photos! htt…
We started Songkran today with a traditional drum dance at Don Mueang Airport. http://t.co/3Cme4DEm1t
We started Songkran celebrations today with a water blessing ceremony from Nok Air execs, and lots of fun games. http://t.co/N9ambhiKZm
@Fewmather Great photo!
We're ready to enjoy the Songkran Fest. If you're flying with us come join our activities near the check-in counter. http://t.co/TNzKCAA8l1
Nok Air CEO Patee Sarasin poses with the company's board of directors at Nok Air's first annual shareholders' meeting http://t.co/ttCbcSEi4g
If you're flying during Songkran fest. be ready for a surprise, as we have a lot of fun activities waiting for you! http://t.co/BiG4mhpbFS
Get ready for Summer! Book your getaway starting at 990THB with our “Summer Splash” promotion. http://t.co/jSJtv30QiA http://t.co/aysx5UGDqm
and we took the necessary action to reaffirm our commitment to the highest standard of safety. 3/3
we apologize for any inconvenience caused to passengers. Safety is at the top of our priority 2/3
Due to an error discovered in the check-in process at Hat Yai International Airport, 1/3
Hat Yai, city of night life. http://t.co/WEpdJM3N4r
If you're going to Phrae, join the Songkran celebrations from April 6-20 for the ultimate water festival fun! http://t.co/D3DKWB1g2X
RT @simpliflying: [VID Interview] @NokAirlines CEO Patee Sarasin: How to to build a likable airline brand http://t.co/BavQcODPIs (cc @Patee…
@Waldbfly1 You're very welcome. Hope you can make it back home soon, have a good night, and a good flight :)
@Waldbfly1 The sales booth is at the Nok Air office located at Sakura Tower, across from Trader's Hotel in Yangon. tel +95(0)1255 050
@Waldbfly1 you can purchase ticketd at our office in Yangon, the address is here. Hope to see you on board :) http://t.co/WD0JvIG4y6
Nok Air proudly announce “Nok Kid Club” membership program for kids under 12 years old. Info: http://t.co/59V8SYCHiS  http://t.co/k3NjL9mzys
Come enjoy traditional Songkran festivities and water splashing fun in the city center of Hat Yai from Apr 11-13. http://t.co/JRbHBCqJz3
@9VSKA totally... We'll have to think about it over a plate of Hat Yai fried chicken.
@9VSKA Then all our flights to Hat Yai will be at sold out for sure! :) Hmm not a bad idea...lol
It's almost lunch time and we're craving for some fried chicken from "Kai Tod Decha" at Cheeautid Rd. in Hat Yai, http://t.co/TSsZFrmRLu
Nok Air is proud to introduce Nok Air Premium seats&Priority baggage for Nok Smile Plus Members. Read more info at: http://t.co/LQJPaF4AYc
Apr4-6 the light and sound spectacular"Miracle Phanom Rung"will take place at Phanom Rung historical park in Buriram. http://t.co/VTVAjIrZdZ
We have just confirmed 2 more orders for Bombardier Q400 Aircraft, we can't wait to have more birds join the family! http://t.co/DOBU81aFWY
@parisara_p Have a safe and pleasant flight :)
@DelSpaff @AngkorRoad @nontgor Normally there is a special handling fee but on Nok Air, that fee has been waived for a while :)
The new issue of JIBjib will be available in-flight tomorrow. Discover Hat Yai's famous attractions and activities. http://t.co/ajUIaWKWIA
Feel Myanmar is a favorite spot for locals and foreigners a like, with plenty of dishes to try. http://t.co/Zu3HnzTcI3
For a taste of authentic of Myanmar, drop by to "Feel Myanmar" located near the Shwedagon Temple. http://t.co/pc54IIvIhP
@borwornrak you're welcome! :-)
Stop by The Governor's Residence to escape the heat and enjoy the beautiful colonial style surroundings. #Yangon http://t.co/F2nJO1h6Q4
A ordination of novice monks taking place at Shwedagon Pagoda in Yangon http://t.co/YesVuu5KhA
A look at the must-visit Shwedagon Pagoda in Yangon. http://t.co/5BSLkRhPZS
Taking a morning stroll through the fresh market and discover fresh flowers and produce on sale #Yangon http://t.co/0PMwCW4vbq
Mingalaba from #Bago #Myanmar impressive temples just outside of Yangon. http://t.co/r5sJnKkeRX
Nok Air is headed to Yangon, Myanmar until Friday. Don't miss our reports from Yangon and Bago!
Our thoughts and prayer goes out to families and those affected on @MAS #MH370 #PrayForMH370 http://t.co/vAjqEWngOw
RT @Patee122: Flew with Nok Air to Yangon for the first time!!! http://t.co/uEL4J8mRaZ
RT @GrabTaxiTH: @go2Thailand 100THB OFF YOUR TAXI RIDE TO AIRPORTS DURING 24 MAR-9 APR 14 http://t.co/sQNi2X9ZCQ  #grabtaxi #taxiapp #socia…
The Chumphon Marine Festival 2014 starts today. Don't forget to visit our booth! http://t.co/WpRBYf1riK
Check out this great video that recaps our biking trip in #Nan last weekend http://t.co/w26kLbxlab
@bart3467 Wow, then emergency row seats for you :)
@FHavg haha the carpet looks cool though, we wouldn't mind sitting in the aisle :)
Check out the inside of NOK PETCHNAAMNGERN. Which seat would you pick? #avgeek #boeing http://t.co/rnfd8wAqjC
Some flights to/from Chiang Mai may be affected today due to the heavy smoke. Please check your flights for any changes.
@ozpromsuk Ok, please DM us now, thank you!
@chompoo007 Have a pleasant flight :)
Congrats to @borwornrak @ozpromsuk :) Please DM your address so we can ship the prizes to you.
Nok Air is adding an extra flight for Bangkok to Phuket during Songkran.http://t.co/r8epbuxVe7 http://t.co/F5b8waQYz2
Nok Air congratulates #PlayboyThailand  on the occasion of Playboy's 60th Anniversary http://t.co/nwuofWM9pl
@HNLRareBirds Wow... what a shot! May we share that on our Facebook and twitter? we will credit, of course :)
3 lucky winners will be randomly picked at 1pm (BKK Time) on Friday, March 21st. Good luck and don't forget to tell your friends (2/2)
Nok Contest! Tweet this picture, tag us and tell us which Nok Air route you want to fly with our new bird (1/2) http://t.co/c4isgGbvqB
To welcome NOK PETCHNAAMNGERN to our fleet, we're going to have a contest. 3 Nok Air umbrellas up for grabs for winners selected at random.
@HNLRareBirds The English translation means "Blue Diamond Bird"
At last NOK PETCHNAAMNGERN has arrived home at Don Mueang Airport. Keep an eye out for her! #avgeek http://t.co/HhYC9Ik7aW
Songkran, the Thai New Year will take place between April 13-15. If you're coming to Thailand be sure to be prepared to get soaked.
We're at The Guitar Mag Awards 2014 tonight, come say hi. Congrats to all award recipients! http://t.co/VBzCD9P8CR
@HNLRareBirds She's keeping it a secret unfortunately, and will only let us know once she arrives at her destination.
NOK PETCHNAAMNGERN has landed in Guam and soon to arrive back in Bangkok! #avgeek #boeing http://t.co/4m5BoMHJcF
@VisitThailandTR Thank you for helping us spread the word. Hope to see you in Pakse :)
Here's a view to brighten up your day. From Bangkok to Chiang Mai, not a bad view, right? #aviation #avgeek #Thailand http://t.co/UkBEPUSDgA
It's time to chill out. Check out our Chill Out Promotion with fares starting at 999THB. http://t.co/GGIjAyykXu http://t.co/lQsjYba7as
Aloha! Our newest bird is being flown home by Nok Pom, and they're just passing through Hawaii. #aviation #boeing http://t.co/rxtr3giDfA
@bart3467 thank you :)
@jeffreykkwoo thank you! Hope you can  fly with her soon :)
@HNLRareBirds our bird has taken off, you can track where she goes. http://t.co/Ta1LxqM4x9
Our newest bird, NOk PETCHNAAMNGERN is on her way home from Seattle to Bangkok! #nokair #boeing #aviation http://t.co/GrdHHUuViC
Wanna fly our birds? We're looking for pilots, come and meet us tomorrow in #Bangkok #aviation #Thailand http://t.co/CdsBcnhmba
Phumin temple features a wall mural that is famous for the painting of "The Whisper" and features 4 buddha statues. http://t.co/EhGDyAI7h3
The Nan National Museum is housed in the palace and features historical artifacts of the region. http://t.co/ud3zkYZOQT
This morning we visit Phra That Khao Noi temple, which was built 6 centuries ago. http://t.co/gSAif5S4IM
The Phra That Chae Hang Festival is a yearly event that is not too miss if you want a thai cultural experience. http://t.co/JkBYSmBqSX
Dinner at "Huen Jao Nang" delicious food next to the Nan river. Perfect setting for a nice evening meal. http://t.co/g9ucDYCHif
At the Wat Nong Bua temple you can visit the Thai Lu village, where traditional tribal textiles are produced. http://t.co/v3Zh4Cgtag
@chiaracokieng we have flights from BKK to CNX and BKK to HKT, but not HKT to CNX. Please check http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl for our route map :)
Rim Nan Art Gallery is located next to the river and founded by famous Thai artist Winai Prabriboo. http://t.co/WyhZLXRizR
Lunch time at Kam Kin Restaurant in Nan. Who's in the mood for some Northern Thai food? http://t.co/tMTDqG8KRD
Thai media and Nok Air team at Wat Hua Wiang Tai temple http://t.co/CofTmNpS9T
Our next stop is Wat Hua Wiang Tai http://t.co/9EWhaT6XPU
Another stop for treats at Ban Don, where khao tan (rice crackers) are made. Another delicious stop in #Nan :) http://t.co/byoLf4VoJd
Stopping at Ban Suan Tarn to taste khao larm (sweet rice in bamboo), a local favorite. http://t.co/aLkSOwWLHl
The Noble House of Chao Fongkham is a beautifully preserved historic house with antique relics inside. #nan http://t.co/lfphpyNcky
